content.p: With short and long-term opportunities available throughout the year, volunteering for the University is a great way for you to learn new skills, make professional connections and give back to the community. Coronavirus (COVID-19): The University remains open for business, but to comply with Government Guidance some of our annual volunteering opportunities have transitioned to the virtual sphere. For more information please contact us. Call 0115 74 84987 or email givingtime@nottingham.ac.uk
